alert.note: Alert for Brown; Nicollet (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 7:44AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sibley, eastern Brown, southeastern Renville and northwestern Nicollet Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 744 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Hanska, or 7 miles southwest of New Ulm, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New Ulm around 750 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lafayette, Winthrop and Gibbon. This includes U.S. Highway 14 between mile markers 90 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
